message: Fair 60-40 split. Accept and let's be friends!
Your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic.  I propose a 52.5-47.5 split in my favor.  Take it, and we avoid further inflation!
Still willing to compromise. 58-42 is as low as I'll go. Inflation is coming!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept my offer of 51.25-48.75, or we both lose more to inflation!
I'm not backing down. 57-43 is my final offer. Inflation will hurt you more than me!
